_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description:
Choose your victory condition.
- Beat All Styles: Beat all 3 Styles in the game.
NOTE: Alternate endings do NOT count. May be changed in the future.
- Defeat NULL: Defeat NULL in the game's final challenge.
WARNING: Is not recommended unless you're really good at the game. This challenge is HARD for a newcomer.
As a guide, unlocking the fight against NULL requires you to:
1. Beat all 3 Styles
2. Beat a Style with all 3 Challenges Activated
3. and get the Alternate Ending in each of the 3 Styles.
Doing all of this will allow you to fight NULL by clicking on Baldi in the Style selection screen. Good luck.
